discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C is ok

choices.A: event scheduler name DOWN-ROUTER event track 2 state 1 not up event action 1.0 command source routerdown.py event start 0:00 repeat 0:05
choices.C: event manager applet ROUTER-DOWN-SLA event track 5 state down action 1.0 event-default action 2.0 cli command source routerdown.py
choices.B: track 3 ip sla 10 reachability event name GATEWAY-DOWN event state down action cli command routerdown.py
choices.D: scheduler job name ROUTER-DOWN job track 9 state down action 1.0 cli source routerdown.py schedule 10

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. An engineer must invoke a Python script that alerts the operations team when the router DC-RTR-1 becomes unreachable. Which configuration set accomplishes this task?

choices.B: Edge Device 1 interface ethernet 2/1 ip address 192.0.2.1/24 ip igmp version 3 Edge Device 2 interface ethernet 2/1 ip address 192.0.2.1/24 ip igmp version 3
choices.A: Edge Device 1 interface ethernet 2/1 ip address 192.0.2.1/24 ip igmp version 3 ip pim sparse-mode Edge Device 2 interface ethernet 2/1 ip address 192.0.2.16/24 ip igmp version 3 ip pim sparse-mode
choices.C: Edge Device 1 interface ethernet 2/1 ip address 192.0.2.1/24 ip igmp version 3 Edge Device 2 interface ethernet 2/1 ip address 192.0.2.16/24 ip igmp version 3
choices.D: Edge Device 1 interface ethernet 2/1 ip address 192.0.2.1/24 Edge Device 2 interface ethernet 2/1 ip address 192.0.2.16/24

questions.question_text: An engineer must configure two Cisco Nexus 7000 Series switches in the same data center to support OTV. Which command set completes the join interface configuration? feature otv otv site-identifier 256 interface overlay 1 otv control-group 239.1.1.1 otv data-group 239.1.1.0/29 otv join-interface ethernet 2/1 otv extend-vlan 5-10 no shutdown

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
A is wrong - no need to configure IP pim sparse-mode on join-interface
B is wrong - same IP address on both Edge Devices interface 2/1
C is the only possible correct answer
D is wrong - missing IP igmp version 3 command on Eth2/1

Selected Answer: C
Pre cisco doc it will be C

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/sw/nx-os/OTV/config_guide/b_Cisco_Nexus_7000_Series_NX-OS_OTV_Configuration_Guide-RI/adv-otv.html#:~:text=Edge%20Device%201%0Ainterface%20ethernet%202/1%0A%20ip%20address,1/1%0A%20otv%20extend%2Dvlan%205%2D10%0A%20no%20shutdown

Selected Answer: C
The answer is correct.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/sw/nx-os/OTV/config_guide/b_Cisco_Nexus_7000_Series_NX-OS_OTV_Configuration_Guide-RI/adv-otv.html#:~:text=Configuration%20Example%20for%20Load%20Balancing
Answer is incorrect. Configure the management before booting kickstart image from TFTP.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
Drag and drop the steps on the left onto the order that they must be implemented on the right for recover a fabric interconnect when there is no working image on the bootflash.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

choices.C: The show install all impact command is not issued before the upgrade
choices.B: Change to the configuration settings or the network connections during the upgrade process
choices.D: The kickstart image is installed by using the install all kickstart image system image command
choices.A: Attempt to simultaneously upgrade more than thee cards

discussion.content: but during upgrade process you cannot configure anything, I think B it's questionable

Selected Answer: B
B is correct!

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/nexus7000/sw/upgrade/guide/cisco_nexus7000_software_upgrade_and_downgrade_guide_8x.html#concept_D796FF72B27C4976AA6976D420E49987:~:text=If%20the%20network%20or%20device%20is%20configured%20while%20the%20upgrade%20is%20in%20progress.

questions.question_text:
An engineer must export the Cisco UCS Manager configuration for backup purposes. The requirement is to export the configuration that contains the AAA and
RBAC configuration. Also, the file must be stores in a human-readable format. Which backup type must be selected to meet these requirements?
